podcast_episode.title: Episode 253 - Tower of Grey (Start of Arc 3)
podcast_episode.name: Episode 253 - Tower of Grey (Start of Arc 3)
podcast_episode.description: <p>It has been seven years since the Lich, Sinu the Red, was defeated. The lands of Drunkeros have more or less been at peace. Sure, no one has done anything about Pyre, the ancient red dragon who controls Mastwick. And occasionally a goblin tribe will harass trading caravans or some poor mercenaries may find themselves turning to the other side of the law. But, the scars of the past are being healed. Deephome is prospering under Queens Aludra and Jaela's rule. Pelor's Hope has opened trade to the far corners of the realm under Queen Ashayara Dayne's stern, but loving care. The monkey village is still really happy that Bonanas Foster is gone. </p><p>We find our heroes, Rowan Grey and Toby Treacletart, in the town of Greenham where they have founded an adventurers league or heroes guild if you want to avoid potential brand confusion. Surely, nothing stressful or odd will happen to them and they can live out the rest of their days in relative bliss. Wouldn't that be boring.</p><p>The adventure continues with Steve Melloncamp (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Jaela (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)! </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/killurmonkey" target="_blank">@killurmonkey</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=1819&p=9684#p9684" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p><p>Check out this week’s Blue Apron menu and get $30 off with free shipping at <a href="http://blueapron.com/dragons" target="_blank">blueapron.com/dragons</a>!</p><p>Head on over to <a href="http://dollarshaveclub.com/dragons" target="_blank">dollarshaveclub.com/dragons</a> to get your DSC starter set for just $5! Again, they have butt wipes. You deserve it.</p><p>Want to impress your pals with your wine collection and good taste? Well head to <a href="http://tryfirstleaf.com/DRAGONS" target="_blank">tryfirstleaf.com/DRAGONS</a> for three bottles for just $15!</p>
podcast_episode.author: michael@geeklyinc.com (GeeklyInc.com)
podcast_episode.filename: Drunks and Dragons - Dungeons and Dragons 5e Actual Play - Episode 253 - Tower of Grey (Start of Arc 3).mp3

podcast_episode.title: Episode 252 - A History of Heroes Part 2
podcast_episode.name: Episode 252 - A History of Heroes Part 2
podcast_episode.description: <p>Thom Harper continues his book report with the help of some of his friends. Unfortunately, Jaela got the flu and couldn't help as much as she wanted. The flu sucks that way. </p><p>This is an anime-ass-recap episode! We haven't done one of these in forever so we wanted to take a stroll down memory lane as well as refresh our memories. Of course, since this is us, we had to come up with an in world justification for the recap which hope you will enjoy.</p><p>The adventure continues with Steve Melloncamp (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Jaela (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)! </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/emily_aultman" target="_blank">@emily_aultman</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=1819&p=9684#p9684" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p><p>Check out this week’s Blue Apron menu and get $30 off with free shipping at <a href="http://blueapron.com/dragons" target="_blank">blueapron.com/dragons</a>!</p><p>Head on over to <a href="http://dollarshaveclub.com/dragons" target="_blank">dollarshaveclub.com/dragons</a> to get your DSC starter set for just $5! Again, they have butt wipes. You deserve it.</p><p>Want to impress your pals with your wine collection and good taste? Well head to <a href="http://tryfirstleaf.com/DRAGONS" target="_blank">tryfirstleaf.com/DRAGONS</a> for three bottles for just $15!</p>
podcast_episode.author: michael@geeklyinc.com (GeeklyInc.com)
podcast_episode.filename: Drunks and Dragons - Dungeons and Dragons 5e Actual Play - Episode 252 - A History of Heroes Part 2.mp3

podcast_episode.title: Episode 251 - A History of Heroes Part 1
podcast_episode.name: Episode 251 - A History of Heroes Part 1
podcast_episode.description: <p>With no great conflicts to attend to our heroes take a breather and reflect on their time adventuring. The hijinks they have gotten into. The dragons/ dragon affiliated foes that they have fought. All of the hairs that have been tuscled. Truly, it has been a journey and a half.</p><p>This is an anime-ass-recap episode! We haven't done one of these in forever so we wanted to take a stroll down memory lane as well as refresh our memories. Of course, since this is us, we had to come up with an in world justification for the recap which hope you will enjoy.</p><p>The adventure continues with Steve Melloncamp (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Jaela (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)! </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="http://www.geeklyinc.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=2045#p10458" target="_blank">pizzatoast</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=1819&p=9684#p9684" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p><p>Simple Contacts is so much easier than going to the eye doctor to get new contacts! To get $30 off your contact lenses, go to <a href="http://simplecontacts.com/dragons" target="_blank">simplecontacts.com/dragons</a> and enter</p><p> code "dragons" at checkout.</p><p>Head on over to <a href="http://dollarshaveclub.com/dragons" target="_blank">dollarshaveclub.com/dragons</a> to get your DSC starter set for just $5! Again, they have butt wipes. You deserve it.</p>
podcast_episode.author: michael@geeklyinc.com (GeeklyInc.com)
podcast_episode.filename: Drunks and Dragons - Dungeons and Dragons 5e Actual Play - Episode 251 - A History of Heroes Part 1.mp3

podcast_episode.title: Episode 250 - The Return of the Raw Fury Games Part 2
podcast_episode.name: Episode 250 - The Return of the Raw Fury Games Part 2
podcast_episode.description: <p>The race is afoot! Team White Spire is going through some tough times but they have managed to keep with the pack and avoid being eliminated/ killed. But, if we are being honest, isn't losing to a bunch of jerks worse than death? Armed with Rudolph's powerful songs, and Rollen's overland travel buff, surely our heroes will take first place! </p><p>The adventure continues with Steve Melloncamp (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Jaela (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)! With special guest Rudoph played by <a href="https://twitter.com/jantonsson" target="_blank">Jonas Antonsson</a>.</p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/theZachNoll" target="_blank">@theZachNoll</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=1819&p=9684#p9684" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p><p>Simple Contacts is so much easier than going to the eye doctor to get new contacts! To get $30 off your contact lenses, go to <a href="http://simplecontacts.com/dragons" target="_blank">simplecontacts.com/dragons</a> and enter</p><p>code "dragons" at checkout.</p><p>Check out this week’s Blue Apron menu and get $30 off with free shipping at <a href="http://blueapron.com/dragons" target="_blank">blueapron.com/dragons</a>!</p><p>Head on over to <a href="http://dollarshaveclub.com/dragons" target="_blank">dollarshaveclub.com/dragons</a> to get your DSC starter set for just $5! Again, they have butt wipes. You deserve it.</p>
podcast_episode.author: michael@geeklyinc.com (GeeklyInc.com)
podcast_episode.filename: Drunks and Dragons - Dungeons and Dragons 5e Actual Play - Episode 250 - The Return of the Raw Fury Games Part 2.mp3

podcast_episode.title: Episode 251 - A History of Heroes Part 1
podcast_episode.name: Episode 251 - A History of Heroes Part 1
podcast_episode.description: <p>With no great conflicts to attend to our heroes take a breather and reflect on their time adventuring. The hijinks they have gotten into. The dragons/ dragon affiliated foes that they have fought. All of the hairs that have been tuscled. Truly, it has been a journey and a half.</p><p>This is an anime-ass-recap episode! We haven't done one of these in forever so we wanted to take a stroll down memory lane as well as refresh our memories. Of course, since this is us, we had to come up with an in world justification for the recap which hope you will enjoy.</p><p>The adventure continues with Steve Melloncamp (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Jaela (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)! </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="http://www.geeklyinc.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=2045#p10458" target="_blank">pizzatoast</a>! podcast_episode.title: Episode 253 - Tower of Grey (Start of Arc 3)
podcast_episode.name: Episode 253 - Tower of Grey (Start of Arc 3)
podcast_episode.description: <p>It has been seven years since the Lich, Sinu the Red, was defeated. The lands of Drunkeros have more or less been at peace. Sure, no one has done anything about Pyre, the ancient red dragon who controls Mastwick. And occasionally a goblin tribe will harass trading caravans or some poor mercenaries may find themselves turning to the other side of the law. But, the scars of the past are being healed. Deephome is prospering under Queens Aludra and Jaela's rule. Pelor's Hope has opened trade to the far corners of the realm under Queen Ashayara Dayne's stern, but loving care. The monkey village is still really happy that Bonanas Foster is gone. </p><p>We find our heroes, Rowan Grey and Toby Treacletart, in the town of Greenham where they have founded an adventurers league or heroes guild if you want to avoid potential brand confusion. Surely, nothing stressful or odd will happen to them and they can live out the rest of their days in relative bliss. Wouldn't that be boring.</p><p>The adventure continues with Steve Melloncamp (<a href="https://twitter.com/themikebachmann" target="_blank">Mike Bachmann</a>), Rowan Grey(<a href="https://twitter.com/jennifercheek" target="_blank">Jennifer Cheek</a>), Jaela (<a href="https://twitter.com/Nika_Howard" target="_blank">Nika Howard</a>), Toby Treacletart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/timlanning" target="_blank">Tim Lanning</a>) and your Dungeon Master (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/thriftynerd" target="_blank">Michael DiMauro</a>). Don’t forget to follow our editor David Stewart (<a href="http://www.twitter.com/spudcam" target="_blank">@spudcam</a>)! </p><p>Podcast art by <a href="https://twitter.com/killurmonkey" target="_blank">@killurmonkey</a>! Want the world to see your fan art? Tweet it with <a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/drunksanddoodles" target="_blank">#DrunksAndDoodles</a> or head on over to the <a href="http://geeklyinc.com/forums/viewtopic.php?f=29&t=1819&p=9684#p9684" target="_blank">forum</a>.</p><p>Check out this week’s Blue Apron menu and get $30 off with free shipping at <a href="http://blueapron.com/dragons" target="_blank">blueapron.com/dragons</a>!</p><p>Head on over to <a href="http://dollarshaveclub.com/dragons" target="_blank">dollarshaveclub.com/dragons</a> to get your DSC starter set for just $5! Again, they have butt wipes. You deserve it.</p><p>Want to impress your pals with your wine collection and good taste? Well head to <a href="http://tryfirstleaf.com/DRAGONS" target="_blank">tryfirstleaf.com/DRAGONS</a> for three bottles for just $15!</p>
